segments.text: I have a package to post today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , what's in the package , madam ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it has a cassette record ... a cassette tape .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How would you like to send it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to insure it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to insure it for 20 dollars . How much shall I pay altogether ?
segments.speaker: S1
